:: Wolfgang ::

:: Hears the announcement through the speakers and is filled with rage. ::

Those basterds, they took over the alliance base! How could Zardus let them 
take over? That traitor!

:: Screams continously, oblivious to the fact that the alliance is still 
strong. ::
